channel.title: Where Do I Start
channel.description:
I need some help on creating a moparscape server. I dont know where to start. I also dont want to download like alot of stuff to my computer. Just like 1 thing. So please help me out.
Thanks knight32

item.title: Where Do I Start
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Well first you need a source like cheezescape or testscape which you can get from the download sectionâ€¦Once you download that you will need hamachi for people to join your server so go to www.hamachi.cc and download that, and create a new network and tell people the network name and pass so they can join your network then they use the ip beside your name to join.You have to click run server in your source folder and leave it running to let people on.

Read full topic
